objects.src: <svg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' viewBox='0 0 1080 1080'><defs><linearGradient id='diagonalGrad' x1='0%' y1='0%' x2='100%' y2='100%'><stop offset='0%' style='stop-color:#0A1626'/><stop offset='100%' style='stop-color:#192841'/></linearGradient><linearGradient id='accentGrad' x1='100%' y1='0%' x2='0%' y2='100%'><stop offset='0%' style='stop-color:#FFD100'/><stop offset='50%' style='stop-color:#FF9E00'/><stop offset='100%' style='stop-color:#FF7B52'/></linearGradient></defs><rect width='1080' height='1080' fill='url(#diagonalGrad)'/><path d='M1080 0 L1080 1080 L0 1080 Z' fill='url(#accentGrad)'/><g opacity='0.1' fill='#ffffff'><rect x='30' y='30' width='200' height='2' transform='rotate(45, 130, 31)'/><rect x='60' y='60' width='300' height='2' transform='rotate(45, 210, 61)'/><rect x='90' y='90' width='400' height='2' transform='rotate(45, 290, 91)'/><rect x='120' y='120' width='500' height='3' transform='rotate(45, 370, 121)'/><rect x='150' y='150' width='600' height='3' transform='rotate(45, 450, 151)'/></g><g opacity='0.2'><circle cx='900' cy='200' r='50' fill='#FF7B52'/><circle cx='150' cy='800' r='30' fill='#FFD100'/><circle cx='950' cy='900' r='70' fill='#0A1626'/></g><path d='M0 540 L1080 540' stroke='#ffffff' stroke-width='1' opacity='0.05'/><path d='M540 0 L540 1080' stroke='#ffffff' stroke-width='1' opacity='0.05'/></svg>

objects.text:
• ENERGYRODS 2.0 for efficient stride
• Ultralight LIGHTSTRIKE PRO cushioning
• Textile rubber outsole for traction
• Best Speed Shoe 2024 Winner

product_details.description: The Adizero Adios Pro 3 is the pinnacle of Adizero Racing products. It was built with and for athletes to achieve unbelievable feats. These adidas running shoes are made to optimize running efficiency. Our carbon-infused ENERGYRODS 2.0 provide lightweight stiffness for a snappy, efficient stride. Ultralight LIGHTSTRIKE PRO cushions every step with two layers of our most resilient foam to help you maintain energy over the long term. It all rides on a thin layer of textile rubber outsole for extraordinary traction in wet and dry conditions. Celebrating our most recent win, Best Speed Shoe 2024 by Women's Health. ENERGYRODS 2.0 limit energy loss Imported Lightstrike Pro cushioning Sole material - Rubber ** Closure type - Lace-Up **

banner_details:
This banner showcases a bold and high-impact layout designed for a modern sports shoe promotion. The background features a diagonal two-tone gradient split—deep navy and vibrant orange tones—adding energy and direction to the design. The large heading text ("heading") in white sans-serif font sits top-left for strong brand visibility, followed by a bright yellow subheading ("subheading") that emphasizes core product value. Below is the feature list ("description") with white bullet points and a decorative orange line ("decorative") adding visual separation. The price ("price") appears in oversized white font to draw attention. A yellow call-to-action button ("cta_button") with contrasting navy text ("cta") is positioned below. To the right, there's an angled product image ("product_image") overlapping the bright half for dynamic contrast.

**Color Palette:**
- Deep Navy: #0A1626
- Mid-Navy: #192841
- Bright Yellow: #FFD100
- Orange: #FF9E00
- Warm Coral: #FF7B52
- White: #FFFFFF
product_color: The product image depicts a sleek, performance-oriented running shoe with a dynamic and modern color palette. The base color is deep black (#000000), used extensively on the upper mesh and sole for a bold, high-impact appearance. Contrasting white (#F5F5F5) stripes highlight the brand's identity and provide strong visual contrast. A gradient blend of soft pink (#F5A8B8) and vibrant yellow (#FFD54F) on the midsole adds a youthful and energetic accent, drawing attention to the shoe’s design innovation. The colors blend organically yet remain distinct, enhancing visual interest. This palette is ideal for sporty, energetic advertising banners conveying motion and style.
